{% endraw %}

MSELoss

Mean Squared Error Loss

{% raw %} 
from fastai.losses import *
from torch.nn import MSELoss
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
a = torch.rand(1,2,10)
b = torch.rand(1,2,10)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
MSELoss()(a,b)

tensor(0.1785)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
MSELossFlat()(a,b)

TensorBase(0.1785)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def mse(a,b):
    a = a.view((1,-1))
    b = b.view((1,-1))
    return ((a-b)**(2)).sum()/a.shape[1]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mse(a,b)

tensor(0.1785)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert mse(a,b) == MSELoss()(a,b)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert mse(a,b) == MSELossFlat()(a,b)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class MSE_(Module):
    def forward(self,a,b):
        a = a.view((1,-1))
        b = b.view((1,-1))
        return ((a-b)**(2)).sum()/a.shape[1]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
MSE_()(a,b)

tensor(0.1785)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert MSE_()(a,b) == MSELoss()(a,b)
{% endraw %}
